attributes.action: Make it compulsory for all dogs to be on a lead when in all public places.
attributes.additional_details:
This is to insure we reduce attacks on the public 
Reduce attacks on other dogs 
Reduce attacks on live stock 
Reduce attacks on any other animals .
attributes.background: Make it unlawful for a dog to be out in any public area without a lead and under control .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569074
